sentence.Network_en: He came to apprise us that the work had been successfully completed.
sentence.Network_cn: 他来通知我们工作已胜利完成.

sentence.Network_en: We must apprise them of the dangers that may be involved.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们必须告诉他们可能涉及的危险。

sentence.Network_en: She came in to apprise me that my presence was required.
sentence.Network_cn: 她进来通知我(有事)需要我出面.

PerfectNetExp.abs: endear使亲密，使受钟爱apprise通知，告知damp使减弱
apprehensive adj．恐惧的，担心的apprise v．通知，告诉approachable adj． 可接近的，随和的．
public 公开的apprise 使注意掩盖类词汇
appraise评价apprise报告通知substantiate证实 unsubstantiated 未经证实的.

list.abs: I have apprised him of your arrival., 我已经告诉他你要来.
I apprised of the committee ' s decision ., 我已获悉委员会的决定.
The speaker seems to be fairly apprised of the situation in the Far East ., 报告人似乎对中东局势相当熟悉.
many applications are quick to keep users apprised of the details of their progress even though a user has no idea what to make of this information .很多程序不停地通知用户其进程的细节，甚至用户根本不了解他们应该如何利用这些信息。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from French appris, apprise, past participle of apprendre 'learn, teach', from Latin apprehendere (see apprehend)

entry.def: When you are apprised of something, someone tells you about it.

example.ex: Have customers been fully apprised of the advantages?...
example.tran: 顾客们已充分了解这些好处吗？

example.ex: We must apprise them of the dangers that may be involved.
example.tran: 我们必须告诉他们可能涉及的危险。

sentences.sentence: "I advised him that the rent was due"
"Have the students been apprised of the tuition hike?"
"The Germans want to appreciate the Deutsche Mark"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有进取心的,有事业心的
stems_affixes.word_buile: enterprise事业心,进取心+ing……的→adj.有进取心的,有事业心的
surprise诧异,惊异+ing状态→adj.令人惊讶的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 事业,企[事]业单位;事业心,进取心
stems_affixes.word_buile: enter进入+prise拿住,抓住→进入抓住[目标]→把某一事业掌握一定范围→企业;事业
sur在……上面+prise拿住,抓住→在上面突然被抓住→吃惊
ap加强动作+prise拿住,抓住→抓住信息

stems_affixes.value_cn: 包含,包括,由……组成;构成,组成
stems_affixes.word_buile: com全部+prise拿住,抓住→全部抓住→包括
sur在……上面+prise拿住,抓住→在上面突然被抓住→吃惊

sentences.en: He came to apprise us that the work had been successfully completed.
sentences.cn: 他来通知我们工作已胜利完成。

sentences.en: We were fully apprised of the situation.
sentences.cn: 我们完全获悉当时的情况。
